DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate that the intraocular pressure(IOP)-lowering efficacy of Travoprost (0.004%) is equal or better than that of Latanoprost 0.005% in patients with chronic angle-closure glaucoma.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of Travoprost 0.004% Compared to Latanoprost 0.005% in Patients With Chronic Angle-Closure Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Adult patients of any race and either sex with chronic angleclosure glaucoma.
